reference_a:
@article{contreras2020,
  title = {A temporal network approach to paranoia: {{A}} pilot study},
  shorttitle = {A temporal network approach to paranoia},
  author = {Contreras, Alba and Valiente, Carmen and Heeren, Alexandre and Bentall, Richard},
  date = {2020-09-18},
  journaltitle = {Frontiers in Psychology},
  shortjournal = {Front. Psychol.},
  volume = {11},
  publisher = {Frontiers},
  issn = {1664-1078},
  doi = {10.3389/fpsyg.2020.544565}
}
topics: paranoia, sadness, closeness to others, avoidance
participants: participants with above-average paranoid ideation and/or interpersonal sensitivity

features.name: sadness
features.coding: At this moment, I feel sad

features.name: useless
features.coding: At this moment, I feel useless (Self-Esteem 1)

features.name: manage_well
features.coding: At this moment, I feel I can manage issues well (Self-Esteem 1)

features.name: no_trust
features.coding:
Since the last “beep”, I have had the 
impression that I cannot trust peopl (Paranoia 1)

features.name: harm
features.coding:
Since the last “beep”, I have had the 
impression that people have tried to harm 
me

features.name: criticism
features.coding:
Since the last “beep”, I have had the 
impression that people have criticized me

features.name: others
features.coding: At this moment, I feel close to others

features.name: avoid
features.coding:
Since the last “beep”, I have tried to 
avoid negative thoughts and feelings
